name: 15 Defense
storyline: Fight them all! This game gets you plunged into a tough fight on the bottom of some imaginary sea. Watch it out, enemies never sleep! Resist their attacks and improve your survival time by upgrading your skills and talents.
summary: 15 Defense is a puzzle game aimed at a wide audience. It enhances thinking and mind reaction as its game logic is based on that of a table game named "Fifteen Puzzle".
